name: @deep-foundation/capacitor-device
description: A deep package that is based on @capacitor/device package

scripts.npm-pull: (git diff --quiet || (echo 'You have unstaged changes. Stash them (git stash) or commit them (git commit)'; exit 1)) && npm install ${npm_package_name}@latest --no-save && mv --force node_modules/${npm_package_name}/* ./
